alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 7:43PM CST until February 21 at 1:45AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo and Hale Counties. .Flooding is expected on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Friday the stage was 85.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday morning to a crest of 92.2 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
